music.Join: Summons the bot to a voice channel.
music.Leave: Clears the queue and leaves the voice channel.
music.Stop: Stops playing song and clears the queue.
music.Remove: Removes a song from the queue.
music.Loop: Loop or unloop the currently playing song.

badge.badgelb: Check the server's Leaderboard of Badges

badges.des: View your (or someone else's) current Gym Badges of the server.
badges.footer: Argument in {} are Optional argument and in [] are required.

gyms.des: View all the gyms with their leaders of the server.
gyms.footer: Argument in {} are Optional argument and in [] are required.

sbadges.des: View all the badges available to the server.
sbadges.footer: Argument in {} are Optional argument and in [] are required.

glrole.des: Set the Gym Leader role of the server. Members with this role can award or revoke badges.
glrole.footer: Argument in {} are Optional argument and in [] are required.

elrole.des: Set the Elite role of the server. Members with this role can add or remove elite streaks.
elrole.footer: Argument in {} are Optional argument and in [] are required.

badgen.des: Create a new badge for the server.
badgen.Syntax:
`{prefix}badgen [badge name] [symbol]`
Symbol can be an emoji or text. Recommended to use Emojis.
badgen.footer: Argument in {} are Optional argument and in [] are required.

leaderadd.des:
Add Gym Leaders for the server, so other members can view them.
Must have added the Badge first using `badgen`.
leaderadd.footer: Argument in {} are Optional argument and in [] are required.

leaderremove.des: Remove a previously added Gym Leader using `leaderadd`.
leaderremove.footer: Argument in {} are Optional argument and in [] are required.

award.des: Award a Gym Badge to a Member. The command user must have any of the Gym Leader role or Manage Server Permission. If you are a Gym Leader, you don't have to mention the `badge`. It will add automatically
award.footer: Argument in {} are Optional argument and in [] are required.

revoke.des: Remove a Gym Badge from a Member added previously. The command user must have any of the Gym Leader role or Manage Server Permission.
revoke.footer: Argument in {} are Optional argument and in [] are required.

badgelb.des: View the Badge Leaderboard of the server. Shows top 10 Members with most badges.
badgelb.footer: Argument in {} are Optional argument and in [] are required.

streaka.des: Increase Elite Streak of a Member by 1. The command user must have any of the Elite role or Manage Server Permission.
streaka.footer: Argument in {} are Optional argument and in [] are required.

streakr.des: Remove all the Elite Streak gained by the Member. The command user must have any of the Elite role or Manage Server Permission.
streakr.footer: Argument in {} are Optional argument and in [] are required.

badgereset.des: Reset the whole Badge System for the server. Member's Profile will be resetted, Gl and El Roles will be resetted, Gym Leaders will be resetted etc.
badgereset.footer: Argument in {} are Optional argument and in [] are required.
